DESCRIPTION: 
Assassins Creed 3 - continuation of the famous series of action games, developed by Ubisoft studio with Ubisoft Singapore.
The action takes place in the third part of the Colonial America of the 18th century, during the war of independence of the United States. Players will assume the role of Connor, the son of a girl from the tribe of the Mohicans and the English colonists. Hero was a freedom fighter and accepted creed assassins after his home burned down enemies.
The combat system is Assassins Creed 3 allows you to use two weapons at the same time, thus attacking and counterattacking several opponents. In addition to standard methods of the assassin, Connor has a variety of firearms and bows and tomahawks.
